alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:04PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Salt Lake...central Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 1004 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Valley City, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Kaysville, Syracuse, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Fruit Heights, East Layton, Antelope Island State Park and Sugarhouse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 305 and 320, and between mile markers 324 and 332. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 101 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
